Name: Receiver
About the game: Receiver was created for the 7-day FPS challenge to explore gun handling mechanics, randomized levels, and unordered storytelling. Armed only with a handgun and an audio cassette player, you must uncover the secrets of the Mindkill in a building complex infested with automated turrets and hovering shock drones. Watch the videos to learn more about our design experiments in this game! Key Features Detailed simulations of a Colt 1911 pistol, S&W Model 10 'Victory' revolver, and Glock 17 with full-auto mod Taser robots and machine gun turrets with physically-based damage models Ballistic modeling of ricochets and bullet drop 11 audio tapes to prepare you to defend yourself against the inevitable Mindkill event Become literate in how guns actually operate
Meta Title: Receiver: Apr 29, 2013, Wolfire Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Receiver? Check out the release date (Apr 29, 2013), developer insights from Wolfire Games, and a complete game summary.
